name: Donkey Gas
description:
Hysterical farting donkey stars in this playable fart app. This game is in early development. Donations will go toward acquiring more music as well as buying beans by the bushel for the developer. As of now, there are about 30 different fart sounds which are all real. We recently added a third level and made levels two and three much harder. We also added jumping and fart gas animations. More levels will be added periodically that contain all new fart sounds. The end goal is to have a polished fart app platform game that will keep you laughing until you are lightheaded.

Thank you for your support!

Lightheaded Games
